This system allows you to lockdown your currently equipped items in order to prevent unauthorized removal and or modification.
This feature will let you set your own 4-digit KEY that you will be using as key to access your equipments.
Please do take note that you must never forget your 4-digit KEY, or else you might lose your right to access on your equipments.
Alternatively, you can purchase 4-digit KEY Recovery Card to recover your lost KEY.
This will not prevent your item from getting dropped when killed.
Set Key Failure 1 Report Bug to Admin!
Set Key Failure 2 Report Bug to Admin!
Type your key to lock or unlock equipment.
Press 'Close' if you only needed to know your current 4 digit key.
Press 'Change Key' if you want to change your key.
Press 'Disable Key' if you want to permanently disable equipment lock.
Action not allowed, equipment is locked.

Melee, Attack will be increased with POW.
Melee, Shooting, STM, Defense will be increased with DEX.
STM and MP will be increased with INT.
HP will be increased with VIT.
SP will be increased with STM.
Attack (Minimum) increases physical damage of melee and ranged attack.
Attack (Maximum) increases physical damage of melee and ranged attack.
Defense decreases damages of melee and ranged attack.
Melee increases the physical damage of melee attack.
Shooting increases the physical damage of ranged attack.
Energy increases the chance of a magical attack.
Accuracy increases the chance to accurate an attack with melee and ranged attacks.
Evasion increases the chance to dodge an attack with melee and ranged attacks.
HP is Health Points. It shows how much damages your character can take.
MP is Magic Points for skill use.
SP is Spirit Points for skill use.
Reduce the damage by Fire element attack and make the element last time short.
Reduce the damage by Ice element attack and make the element last time short.
Reduce the damage by Electric element attack and make the element last time short.
Reduce the damage by Poison element attack and make the element last time short.
Reduce the damage by Energy element attack and make the element last time short.
Attribute points will decrease when user attack others outside of PK time.
It can be recovered by doing some quests or cleaning dormitory.
Depending on the attributes, you cannot use some items or you cannot get in to some areas.
Sometimes, you will get attacks by Execution staff.
It will be acquired by Duel, Quest, Attendance Quest.
You can partially purchase items with this points, and you can get inside some regions limited.
It shows how many times your information is inquired.
Whenever character level is upgraded, you will acquire 3 points (Extreme Class, 4 points).
You can increase POW, DEX, INT, VIT, STM with the points.
Critical increases the success rate of critical hit when attacking enemy.
Strike increases the success rate of strike hit when attacking enemy.
Moving speed increases character's moving speed.
Attack speed increases character's attack speed.
EXP increases acquired EXP from hunted mobs.
HP Recovery rate increases the speed of HP recovery.
MP Recovery rate increases the speed of MP recovery.
SP Recovery rate increases the speed of SP recovery.
CP Recovery rate increases the speed of CP recovery.
"Potion HP increased amount" shows increased amount of HP using potion.
"Potion MP increased amount" shows increased amount of MP using potion.
Potion SP increased amount" shows increased amount of SP using potion.
Potion CP increased amount" shows increased amount of CP using potion.
Detail Information Item, Skill, Event, Q-Box Effect can be set in the Option Page.
Left click to open Point Shop
1 Click on the item, drag and put it above the same item then right click to put it in the same slot.
2 Click on the item and drag it to the empty slot to separate it.
3 Press enter to open chatting window then right click on the item while pressing Ctrl button to link it.
4 Most of the item can be used by right clicking on it.
5 Right click on the item to equip it.
6 Click on the item while pressing Alt key to see the item's preview.
Not available, You can click 'Expand' below for inventory expansion.

BackPack is available in your inventory, would you like to use it?
